text: "Ain't It Funny (Murder Remix)" is a song by American entertainer Jennifer Lopez. The song, a remix of "Ain't It Funny", features additional vocals from Ja Rule (Jeffery Atkins) and Cadillac Tah as well as backing vocals from fellow R&B; singer Ashanti. The song is about a relationship where a man plays around and cheats on a woman. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2002) Peak position Australia (ARIA) N.B. The 2002 chart run is mistakenly listed on australian-charts.com as a re-entry for the original version, when it was actually a separate entry for the Murder Remix, which is shown correctly in the following source: 9 Canada (Nielsen SoundScan) 12 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 13 Greece (IFPI) 22 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2002) Position Australia (ARIA) 88 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 72 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 74 Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) 57 UK Singles (OCC) 54 US Billboard Hot 100 13 US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) 34 ===Decade-end charts=== Chart (2000–2009) Position US Billboard Hot 100 62 ===All-time charts=== Chart (1958–2018) Position US Billboard Hot 100 463 == References == Category:2002 songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Hip hop soul songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Jennifer Lopez songs Category:Ja Rule songs
title: Ain't It Funny (Murder Remix)
